description: Stylesheet for theming and layout of the blogging website frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and applies theme colors.

classes.description: Styling for the App logo with animation effects.

classes.description: Styling for links with thematic colors.

classes.description: Button to toggle between light and dark themes.
